sourcesContent:
🎛️ Tableau de Bord Administrateur

{{ section.title }}

import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-dashboard', templateUrl: './dashboard.component.html', styleUrls: ['./dashboard.component.css'] }) export class DashboardComponent { expandedSections: { [key: string]: boolean } = {}; visibleForms: { [key: string]: boolean } = {}; isExpanded(section: string): boolean { return this.expandedSections[section] || false; } expandSection(section: string, event: Event): void { event.stopPropagation(); this.expandedSections[section] = !this.expandedSections[section]; } toggleForm(section: string, event: Event): void { event.stopPropagation(); this.visibleForms[section] = !this.visibleForms[section]; } isFormVisible(section: string): boolean { return this.visibleForms[section] || false; } }
